title: 252A.12 APPOINTMENT OF PUBLIC GUARDIAN NOT A FINDING OF INCOMPETENCY.
text: An appointment of the commissioner as public guardian shall not constitute a judicial finding that the person with a developmental disability is legally incompetent except for the restrictions that the public guardianship places on the person subject to public guardianship. The appointment of a public guardian shall not deprive the person subject to public guardianship of the right to vote.
